name: adc_ltm_snatpool_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()

def getLTMSnatPoolList():
    '''
    to get the list of LTM snat pool

    '''

    ltm_snat_pool_list = []
    adc_ltm_snat_pool_list = connect_db.appviewx.ls.find()
    for device in adc_ltm_snat_pool_list:
        ltm_snat_pool_list.append(device)
    return ltm_snat_pool_list
description: To get a list of LTM snatpool
_keywords: To get a list of LTM snatpool
